name: Trap Them - Sniper Edition
description: In this puzzle shooter you take the role of a sniper. Collect all the crystals without getting caught by the RoboTTech robots. Be smart about shooting down the environment to shape it to your needs and guide the crystal collector safely through the caves.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP Graphics: DirectX9 GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
